title: Taco Bell-pocalypse Now, Gwyneth Paltrow Scam Heiress 7.8.19
itunes:title: Taco Bell-pocalypse Now, Gwyneth Paltrow Scam Heiress 7.8.19
description:
In episode 427, Jack and Miles are joined by Night Call's Molly Lambert to discuss Taco Bell’s ‘Tortillapocalypse,' the US leading in the amount of waste produced, Trump's Facebook ads using models to portray supporters, Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop wellness summit, the 40th anniversary of the Sony Walkman, a woman divorcing her ghost husband, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

1. Taco Bell Confirms ‘Tortillapocalypse’ Is Real, Recommends Gorditas Instead

2. US top of the garbage pile in global waste crisis

3. Trump Facebook ads use models to portray actual supporters

4. Fury at Gwyneth Paltrow over wellness summit: ‘A f - - king extortionist’

5. 40 years ago, the Sony Walkman changed how we listen to music

6. Mining the nostalgia trend, Sony celebrates 40 years of Walkman

7. Vintage 'Guardians of the Galaxy' Walkmans Selling for Hundreds on Ebay

8. Why Star-Lord's Walkman Ended Up Being A Huge Pain In Marvel's Ass

9. Woman Who Married A 300-Year-Old Pirate Ghost Reveals They’re Splitting Up

10. WATCH: Freddie Gibbs & Madlib - Giannis ft. Anderson .Paak

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
